General.Name: TDM Berhad
General.Description: TDM Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the cultivation of oil palms in Malaysia and Indonesia. It operates through three segments: Plantation, Healthcare, and Investment Holding and Others. The company is involved in the production, processing, and trading of fresh fruit bunches, crude palm oil, palm kernel, and related products. The company also owns and operates specialist community hospitals, which offer secondary healthcare services, such as general medicine; pediatrics; orthopedics; general surgery; radiology; obstetrics; gynecology; ear, nose, and throat; dermatology; ophthalmology; urology; anesthesiology; and gastroenterology. In addition, it provides healthcare consultancy and management services to specialist medical centers; operated ambulatory care center; and engages in facility management and maintenance, assets management, and real estate businesses. The company was incorporated in 1965 and is headquartered in Kuala Terengganu, Malaysia. TDM Berhad is a subsidiary of Terengganu Incorporated Sdn. Bhd.
